label: [analytics] Node-RED Community catalogue
info: ### Article Provides the basis for [Node-RED Development: The Numbers](https://blog.openmindmap.org/blog/crunchy-numbers) article. ### Using Kick off the retrieval of auxillary data (version and download numbers) by hitting the big red reset button. There is a dashboard tab containing all the charts, somewhere under `http://noderedhost:1880/ui` or similar. ![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1699464638942_Screen_Shot_2023-11-08_at_18.30.34.png) The next step is to find the refresh button that then updates the graphs with data but this will only be complete once auxiliary data has been fully retrieved. This can be checked by using the download counter flows: one, two, three and four. Their output should be somewhere around upwards of 4700, i.e., one per module. ### Description A basic analysis of the Node-RED Community catalogue, which provides the basis for the packages installable within Node-RED. ![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1698262081584_Screen_Shot_2023-10-25_at_21.27.57.png) ![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1698262103086_Screen_Shot_2023-10-25_at_21.28.19.png) ![img](https://cdn.openmindmap.org/content/1698262124007_Screen_Shot_2023-10-25_at_21.28.40.png)
